trends: There have been no other sightings in Chickamauga
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was out watching a meteor showerwhen I saw an unusual light. I focused my binoculars on the object. It seemed to be round, with lights around it. It moved back and forth so fast that I could barely stay focused on it. It finally passed overhead. As it was about to disappear over the tree line a jet came very fast toward it from the northeast. When the jet was almost to the object, it made a 90 degree turn to the west, and disappeared in about two seconds. My wife also witnessed guise
Summary: circle of different colered lights, moving fast, and hovering. jet flew to it,and object made a 90 degree turn west and vanished
